seo.title: Bus back to Hostel Brikette from Positano's main beach
seo.description: Follow these steps from the beach to the interno bus, ride up to Bar Internazionale/Chiesa Nuova, and finish the short walk to Hostel Brikette.

linkLabel: Bus back to Hostel Brikette from Spiaggia Grande
intro: After enjoying the beach, follow these steps to take the bus back up to Hostel Brikette.

sections.title: 1. Walk to the bus stop
body: From the beach, walk up the stairs to reach the main road level. The Piazza dei Mulini bus stop is located in the center of town, in the middle of the shopping district near the pharmacy.
This bus stop represents the lowest point in the town that traffic can reach. Look for the blue and white bus stop sign mounted on a metallic pole.
Wait at this stop for the interno Positano bus heading uphill.

images.alt: Piazza dei Mulini bus stop in the center of Positano near the main beach
images.caption: The Piazza dei Mulini bus stop — located in the town center shopping district near the pharmacy

sections.title: 2. Take the bus
body: Board the bus when it arrives — check the electronic sign on the front to confirm it displays 'interno positano'.
Validate your ticket when boarding. The bus will wind its way uphill through Positano's narrow streets, making several stops along the way.
The total distance is about 4.1km (2.5 miles). Stay alert for your stop at Bar Internazionale/Chiesa Nuova.

images.alt: View from inside the interno Positano bus showing the winding coastal route
images.caption: The interno bus winds uphill through Positano's streets — check the electronic sign says 'interno positano'

sections.title: 3. Get off the bus
body: Get off at the Bar Internazionale/Chiesa Nuova bus stop. You'll see the tabacchi (convenience store) at this stop.
After exiting, head back to the main road if needed.

sections.title: 4. Walk to the hostel
body: From the bus stop, turn left and walk approximately 100m (330 feet) along the main road in the direction the bus was traveling.
Look for the stairs on your right that lead up to the hostel's main entrance. Take these stairs up to reach Hostel Brikette's main door.

tips: Purchase bus tickets at any tabacchi (newsagents/convenience stores) before boarding. Carry a spare ticket so you can board immediately if the bus is busy.
Check the interno bus timetable for current schedules and ticket prices — these can vary by season.
If services finish early, fall back to the %LINK:positanoMainBeachWalkBack|walking route% — it follows the hostel's staircase checkpoints.
The Piazza dei Mulini stop is the lowest point in town that buses can reach, making it the most convenient pickup point from the beach area.
Let reception know if you spot timetable changes so the digital concierge stays current for other guests.
